name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Backend Engineer with 13+ years of experience in developing high-performance applications, particularly skilled in **Node.js**, **TypeScript**, and proficient in using **MongoDB**, **Kafka**, and **Redis**. Experienced in implementing **Koa** and **NestJS** frameworks for backend services. Strong expertise in event-driven architectures and microservices, coupled with hands-on experience in monitoring and performance optimization using **Prometheus**, **Grafana**, and **Datadog**. 
Additionally, I have a solid background in delivering AI/ML-powered solutions with a focus on real-time processing and predictive analytics. My cloud-native development skills include deploying applications on **AWS** and **Azure**. I am well-versed in compliance-driven practices, ensuring alignment with industry standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS. My technical background is strengthened by strong MLOps capabilities, utilizing tools like **MLflow** and **Airflow** for streamlined model management.
